", "answer": "Nuclear Poly Hedrosis Virus (NPHV) is used for the biological control of pests that affect Pulses crops, helping to reduce crop damage and improve yields. \n"}, {"question": "How can a farmer apply for this scheme? ", "answer": "Farmers can apply by submitting their applications to the Assistant Agricultural Officer at the village level, Agricultural Officer / Deputy Agricultural Officer at the block level, Assistant Director of Agriculture at the block level, or the Joint Director of Agriculture at the district level.
